title: Customer Experience Practical Competency Enhancement: Collaborative Learning Design Strategies for Online Transition in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Participants can propose three or more strategies for designing effective group work in online environments
Participants can develop two or more instructional designs to mitigate psychological burdens (e.g., anxiety) during collaborative learning
Participants can plan three types of activities that promote social interaction in blended (face-to-face/online) environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
